contextDescription: Introduction to Python lists and tuples: creating, manipulating, and understanding fundamentals of sequential data structures
learningObjectives: Understand why Python programming is awesome
Learn what lists are and how to use them
Identify differences between strings and lists
Use lists as stacks and queues
Learn what tuples are and how to use them
Understand when to use tuples versus lists
Learn what a sequence is in Python
Understand tuple packing and sequence unpacking
Use the del statement to delete elements
Implement C functions to work with Python objects
Manipulate complex data structures (lists of lists)
prerequisites: Control flow in Python (if/else, loops, functions)
Basic C programming for advanced tasks
